question: Which former Indian athlete has been appointed as a member of the Athletes Commission of the Asian Athletics Association (AAA)?
explanation: Legendary Indian athlete and Olympian P.T. Usha has been appointed as a member of the Athletes Commission of the Asian Athletics Association (AAA). Usha will be one of the six members of the AAA Athletes Commission. The commission will be headed by 1992 Olympics gold medallist hammer thrower Andrey Abduvaliyev of Uzbekistan. Usha is known for her stellar performance at the 1984 Los Angeles Olympics, where she missed the bronze in the 400m hurdles finals by 1/100 second. The \'Payyoli Express\' was awarded with the prestigious Arjuna Award in 1983. Recently,  Usha  is nominated for the prestigious International Association of Athletics Federation (IAAF) Veteran Pin Award.
